name: aspnet_webforms
query: extension in -i {asax, aspx, asmx, ascx, ashx}

name: binaries
query: extension in -i {dll, exe, pdb, so, DLL, cd, EXE, suo,jar,ear,war}

name: build
query: extension in -i {gradle, sbt} or name contains gradle or name in {Jenkinsfile, pom.xml, buildconfig.yml, version.properties, hosts.yml, log-messages.xml, web.xml, features.json, buildconfig.yml, version.properties, build.xml, site.xml, maven_settings_sample.xml}

name: businesrules
query: extension in -i {drl, bom, voc, brl, dta, dtr, fct, rfl, trl, dep, dop, qry, b2x, rulepackage, irl, syncEntries, ruleproject}

name: c++
query: extension in -i {c, h, cpp, hpp, cc, hh, cxx, hxx, H, CPP, C, Cpp}

name: certificate
query: extension in -i {key, scr, pem, cer, pfx, ppk, crt}

name: configuration
query: extension like insensitive *config or extension like insensitive *settings or extension in -i {ini, conf, cfg, project, header, targets, ruleset}

name: database
query: extension in -i {sql, cql, usql, sqlt, esql, sql', SQL}

name: document
query: extension in -i {txt, doc, pdf, info, md, markdown, rst, xlsx, adoc, PDF, docx, rtf, TXT, pbix, p7s, xls, MD, pptx} or name in {LICENSE, license, NOTICE, HEADER, README}

name: environment
query: extension in -i {deployment, factorypath, node-version, pubxml, manifest} or name in {feature.xml, release.xml}

name: font
query: extension in -i {ttf, otf, woff, woff2, eot}

name: image
query: extension in -i {jpg, jpeg, png, gif, svg, ico, graffle, psd, psd1, cgi, gv}

name: ios
query: extension in -i {ipa, ipsw, vcf, icns, plist, webarchive, scpt, pbxproj, strings, xib, storyboard, nib, entitlements, xcscheme, xcconfig}

name: java_boilerplate
query: extension is -i classpath or name is -i package-info.java

name: noise
query: extension in -i {24px,betwixt,common,content,contrib,cpy,dat,enc,fmt,gen,hsp,hsw,in,index,jfm,log,Logger,lst,mako,md5,mex,mf,migration,msc,msg,multi,mymetadata,mystrutsdata,name,old,order,permutations,pkl,pklz,pp,Processor,refactorlog,rep,resources,rnc,rng,rsp,sas,sch,ser,service,template,tests,tmp,uat,user,wsgi,xdt} or extension like -i *javadoc* or extension like -i *core* or extension like -i *backup* or extension like -i js_* or extension like -i part* or extension like -i orig* or extension like -i pkl* or extension like -i *bak* or extension like insensitive *bak* or extension like -i *backup* or extension like insensitive *log*

name: oraclebpm
query: extension in -i {bpmn, bpel, mplan, jca, rules, jpr}

name: proj_boilerplate
query: extension like -i *proj or extension is -i iml

name: scala
query: extension in -i {scala} or name is sca-processor

name: scripts
query: extension in -i {sh, bat, ksh, bsh, cmd, ps1, script}

name: sourcecontrol_boilerplate
query: extension in -i {svcinfo, svcmap, vssscc, vspscc, gitattributes, gitignore, gitkeep, gitmodules, scc} or name is -i gitattributes or extension like -i *svn*

name: sqlserver
query: extension in -i {rdlc, rdl, dtsx, params, conmgr} or name is DatabaseSettings.xml

name: stylesheet
query: extension in -i {less, css, xsl, scss, xss}

name: testfiles
query: extension in -i {tpp, txx, loadtest, webtestresult, webtest}

name: tools_boilerplate
query: path like *checkstyle* or path like *pmd* or name in {sonar-project.properties,coverity.conf,sonar.properties,lombok.config,descriptor.xml, override_java.security} or extension in -i {StyleCop,pmd} or name like *log4*

name: vagrant
query: extension like -i *vagrant* or name like insensitive *vagrant*

name: visualstudio_boilerplate
query: extension in -i {vsext, sln, nupkg, nswag, nuspec, resx, datasource, myapp, licx, rsd, xsc, xsx, ssmssln, vsmdi, webinfo}

name: xml
query: extension in -i {xml, xsd, dtd, xhtml, axml, xslt, XML, dacpac, xmi} and not name in {feature.xml, release.xml, descriptor.xml, pom.xml, DatabaseSettings.xml}
